params.aggregateAmount: Total amount of ERC-20 assets to be streamed to all recipients.
params.asset: The address of the streamed ERC-20 asset.
params.cancelable: Indicates if each stream will be cancelable.
params.expiration: The expiration of the streaming campaign, as a Unix timestamp.
params.initialAdmin: The initial admin of the Merkle streamer contract.
params.ipfsCID: Metadata parameter emitted for indexing purposes.
params.merkleRoot: The Merkle root of the claim data.
params.recipientsCount: Total number of recipients eligible to claim.
params.streamDurations: The durations for each stream due to the recipient.
params.transferable: Indicates if each stream NFT will be transferable.

returns.merkleStreamerLL: The address of the newly created Merkle streamer contract.

createMerkleStreamerLL(address,address,a.notice: Creates a new Merkle streamer that uses Lockup Linear.

documentation.text: @notice Emitted when a Sablier V2 Lockup Linear Merkle streamer is created.

@title ISablierV2MerkleStreamerFactory
 @notice Deploys new Lockup Linear Merkle streamers via CREATE2.
